channel.title: Buying items
channel.description: when you right click to buy an item, and it says "buy 10", in what file can i change that?

item.title: Buying items
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

You can add another option after “Buy 10”
Client sided:
In RSInterface.java find:

if(rsInterface.parentID == 1644) rsInterface.actions[2] = "Operate";
And right under it, add this:

if(rsInterface.parentID == 3824) rsInterface.actions[4] = "Buy 100";

Server sided:
In BankX1:
Under

Add:

Read full topic

item.title: Buying items
item.dc:creator: @xXxSkillerxXx xXxSkillerxXx
item.description:
@xXxSkillerxXx wrote:

Client Side:
config.java Client.java
Server Side:
ClickingButtons.java
ActionHandler.java
IN config.java or client.java there should be the “Buy 10”
but you also need to make it so when you change it to for instance 50 you need to make it server sided so it buys 50 soo look in actionhandler and clickingbuttons and if there not in there try Client.java in the server source or config.java in the server source… hope i helped (i dont know much but i tried)

Read full topic
